"mahathmaya eeka baibalayak - eeka baibalayak ya!"yi mora gasamin hethema ma samipayata diwa gena aawe ya.meya asimen ma thula athi wu prithiya asimitha ya.ma langa baibalayak nowi ya.me jiwithaye di yalith baibalayak labime - balime - aashawa da ma dura gasa boho kal wiya.eheyin prithiyen pina giya mama bili piththa paththakata wisi kota baibalaya athata gathimi.gath satiye ma athin peralune baibalaye dahasaya wani parichchedaya ya.ehi ma asa gasunu prathama sthanaya this wani padyaya ya.me padyayen shantha pol amatha sirakaruwek mese amathayi : "wimukthiya labimata ma kumak kala yuthu da?"

meyata ohu gagana chumbithayakda aadhara karagena atha.mishan imposibal gos pratokol hi tum krus dubayi hi barj kalifa tharanaya kara ha samana dakmak mehida daknata atha.sabawinma meya baladhari anumathuya lath wakiyum klinarayan pilibanda purwa pracharanayata yodana welanda upakramayaki.kotas dekakin samanwitha age barata sarilana lesa randunu mema wakiyum kilinaraye athi balathi uragena alima nisath gagana chumbakaya nisath thawa athi aarakshaka pati nisath aya sathu maraniya wedanawa nam pahawa yannata atha.

anith karanaya nam musalmanuwange salli walata yata una wataraka wijith himi jathiya sasanaya pawa dena hati widiyo walin nuba nodutwehida ma mithura ko eewata sanwada methana mata pena hatiyata oba yahapalane wiya yuthuya mahinda nadeth ekka thibena tharahata oba ee himiyange pitin arinnayi lasthiya methana thiyenne sasanaya pirihena kathawa nowe ee mathin eeta yatin duwana deshapalana thathwayak hatiyatayi mata penne kese ho wewa hith amanapa kam nam thiya ganna epa ma mithure ..budusaranayi !
